component.name: GTLLM
component.summary: Multi-LLM chat application with game theory inspired modes

description.p: GTLLM (Game Theory LLM) is a desktop application that tries to use multi-LLM chat system inspired by game theory concepts and Andrej Karpathy's council llm demo. It provides several unique chat modes:

ul.li: Standard - Normal single or multiple LLMs in individual chats
PvP - 2 LLMs compete with 1 moderator judging
Collaborative - Multiple LLMs work together to agree on the best solution
Competitive - LLMs propose solutions and vote on the best one (can't vote for their own)
LLM's Choice - The LLMs decide whether to collaborate or compete

description.p: GTLLM uses OpenRouter APIs for LLM inference, allowing you to use various language models through a single API key. You must have your own OpenRouter key
This application has been built with Dioxus and Tailwind CSS.
